naslov: Samostojeća kuća: Sveti Ivan Zelina, Bunjak, 682.00 m2 - ZAMJENA- (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju kuća ukupne bruto površine 810 m², smještena na uređenoj parceli veličine cca 6.000 m² u mirnom naselju Bunjak, udaljenom oko 30 km od Zagreba i 9 km od Svetog Ivana Zeline. Kuća se sastoji od tri etaže i tavanskog prostora te nudi brojne mogućnosti — kako za stanovanje, tako i za investiciju (kuća za odmor, dom za starije, objekt za proslave, ugostiteljstvo i slično). **Raspored prostorija:** **Suteren:** dvije garaže i više spremišta. **Prizemlje:** stambeni i poslovni dio. Stambeni dio čine natkriveni ulaz, jedna soba i WC. Poslovni dio uključuje višenamjenski prostor (trenutno prostor za druženja), kupaonicu s WC-om, spremišta, sanitarni čvor, terasu i vanjske stepenice. Izlaz na prostranu natkrivenu terasu (70,35 m²) s panoramskim pogledom. **Kat:** dnevni boravak, kuhinja s blagovaonicom, tri sobe, WC, kupaonica s WC-om, terasa i natkrivena terasa. **Tavanski prostor:** neuređen, dodatna mogućnost uređenja. Grijanje je na plin. Okućnica je održavana i pruža visoku razinu privatnosti. Mogućnost izgradnje bazena. **Vlasništvo uredno.** **Moguća zamjena za manji stan u Zagrebu ili nekretninu na moru.** Za dodatne informacije i dogovor oko razgleda, molimo javite se. --- ### **ENGLISH – Property for Sale** For sale: a spacious house with a total gross area of 810 m², situated on a well-maintained plot of approximately 6,000 m². Located in the peaceful village of Bunjak, just 30 km from Zagreb and 9 km from the town of Sveti Ivan Zelina. The house is spread over three floors plus an attic space and offers multiple possibilities — suitable as a family residence or for investment purposes (holiday home, retirement home, event venue, hospitality business, etc.). **Layout:** **Basement:** two garages and several storage rooms. **Ground floor:** residential and business sections. The residential area consists of a covered entrance, one room, and a toilet. The business section includes a multifunctional room (currently used for gatherings), bathroom with toilet, storage rooms, sanitary area, terrace, and external stairs. There is access to a spacious covered terrace (70.35 m²) with panoramic views. **First floor:** living room, kitchen with dining area, three bedrooms, toilet, bathroom with toilet, terrace, and covered terrace. **Attic space:** unfinished, offering potential for further development. Gas heating. The surrounding land is landscaped, offers privacy, and has the potential for a swimming pool. **Ownership is clear and legally registered.** **Exchange possible for a smaller apartment in Zagreb or a coastal property.** For more information or to arrange a viewing, please get in touch.
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Poljanički prilaz 8, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
